title: Organizational Ambidexterity Vision and Procedural Memory Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic organizational behavior and mathematical modeling
context.additional_context: Learners analyze real organizational cases through team-based projects and conduct data collection and structural equation modeling practices using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Mathematically express the Knowledge Channels Model explaining the interaction between focal and peripheral visions within an organization.
Analyze the impact of procedural memory on integrative vision formation using structural equation modeling.
Produce project deliverables that measure organizational learning outcomes through team collaboration.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
